attributes.action: Stop charging to become a bankrupt.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: charging to become bankrupt is not appropriate because it forces people in dire circumstance to borrow to pay the fees knowing that they cannot pay the money back and those who cant borrow to continue on a fast track to desperation as they cannot pay the fee and so cannot go bankrupt and these are the people who really are in need to do so. so we ask for the fee to be waived even if its only for if you are able to prove you need to declare bankruptcy in certain circumstance. IE unable to provide the basics such as water, gas and electric.
